entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight with flurries. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
